SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.notice.model.dao.NoticeDAO#selectAllNoticeList() */ A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE FROM MG_NOTICE A JOIN MG_MEMBER B ON (A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY A.NOTICE_NO DESC
INSERT INTO MG_QNA A ( A.QNA_NO , A.QNA_TITLE , A.QNA_BODY , A.QNA_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.QNA_TYPE , A.CATEGORY_CODE ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE MG_QNA A SET A.QNA_COUNT = (SELECT B.QNA_COUNT FROM MG_QNA B WHERE B.QNA_NO = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.QNA_NO = ?

SELECT A.QNA_NO , A.QNA_TITLE , A.QNA_BODY , A.QNA_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , A.QNA_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE FROM MG_QNA A JOIN MG_MEMBER B ON (A.QNA_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.QNA_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.QNA_NO = ?
SELECT /**/ COUNT(*) FROM MG_QNA A WHERE A.QNA_STATUS = 'Y'
